Translations.Text: Among His proofs est ti vi seg land ankoraux tiam as baldaux as ni dusx gxi akv gxi vibr life! Surely Unu revived gxi revive dead Li est Omnipotent
Surely those distort our revelations ne kasx us. Unu gets jxet Infer put unu ven secure Tag Resurrection? Do whatever vi wish Li est Seer de cxio vi do
Those rejected Quran's proof when gxi ven them ankaux rejected Honorable libr
Ne falsehood enter gxi en des preter en des future revelation el Sagx Praiseworthy
Ki est dir al vi est precisely ki est dir al previous messengers! Your Lord posed forgiveness Li ankaux posed painful retribution

Ni far gxi non-Arabic Quran ili dir did gxi ven en ke idiom? Whether est Arabic non-Arabic dir those kred gxi est direkt healing As por those disbelieve ili est surd blind gxi as ili addressed el faraway
Ni don Moses scripture gxi ankaux disput! Se ne est your Lord's predetermined decision ili jugx tuj. Ja ili haven tro many dub
Whoever works righteousness does por his own bon whoever works evil does tial his own detriment! Your Lord est neniam unjust towards popol
